img.rs-layer: Re-writing the future, one student at a time.

div.h1: Richard Wright Public Charter School for Journalism and Media Arts
div.div: Richard Wright fortifies its students with the resounding impact of education, transforming lives in a highly creative, engaging, and student-centered environment with a caring, highly qualified staff of professionals to develop students for college and beyond. With its unique focus on journalism, media, creative and performing arts, RWPCS offers a myriad of opportunities, both on and off campus, for all students to thrive and achieve.

a.span: Attention Richard Wright family, spring break is a

img.alt: Attention Richard Wright family, spring break is approaching! From Monday April 20th through Tuesday April 28th there will be no online classes. Students will resume online learning Wednesday April 29th. Teachers and staff will return Tuesday, the 28th. Please remember to stay safe during this time! Enjoy the break students and teachers! #WeAre #RichardWright

a.span: Just a reminder parents that today we will be host

img.alt: Just a reminder parents that today we will be hosting another Parent Zoom Call today at 3:30! #WeAre #richardwright

Posted @withregram • @urbanhealthmediaproject "My great auntie Lena is 90 years old, meaning she is at a higher risk of dying from the coronavirus, and along with her congestive heart failure, the risk practically doubles" shares Amora Campbell from @rwpcsroxie. . Read about her experience dealing with the quarantine. Link in the bio!

a.span: Happy Friday! Parents, report cards have been issu

img.alt:
Happy Friday! Parents, report cards have been issued electronically via ESchoolPlus. If you run into any issues or have any questions, please email Mr. Malone @ mmalone@richardwrightpcs.org
#WeAre #RichardWright

a.span: Attention Richard Wright students, tomorrow we wil

img.alt: Attention Richard Wright students, tomorrow we will be hosting our very first Family Matters Zoom call from 12-12:30pm! As you know, Family Matters is important to us as it allows everyone to come together with love and to remember what it means to be Richard Wright Ready. Students, please look out for an emailed invitation from Mr. Radford. Looking forward to seeing you there! #weare #richardwright

img.alt:
April is National Sexual Assault Awareness Month. Richard Wright Feature Film “Because I Love Him”

a.span: Thanks to our AWESOME RW PARENTS & FAMILIES for yo

img.alt: Thanks to our AWESOME RW PARENTS & FAMILIES for your support, encouragement, and involvement! Thank you to our amazing TEACHERS and the whole RW TEAM & COMMUNITY! We value you. We appreciate you! Stay safe and stay healthy. Continuing to work it out together... #weare #richardwright #family #community #roxie #spartans #highschool #charterschools #dccharterproud #journalism #media #arts #creativity #educationiskey #representationmatters #imaginethat

a.span: RW STUDENTS! Join DR. CLARK’s KOOL AID ROUNDUP F

img.alt: RW STUDENTS! Join DR. CLARK’s KOOL AID ROUNDUP FOR KIDS this THURSDAY, APRIL 2, 4:30pm ON ZOOM! #weare #richardwright #roxie #spartans #family #community #highschool #charterschools #dccharterproud #educationiskey #imaginethat

a.span: Greetings Parents! This Friday, we will be hosting

img.alt: Greetings Parents! This Friday, we will be hosting another check-in Zoom Call to see how everyone is doing. Please be on the lookout for an email invitation from Mrs. Glover throughout the week

p.span: Richard Wright Parents! Don’t forget to join us for our weekly Parent Zoom Call, Fridays at 3:30. We want to hear from you all and make sure everyone is staying safe! If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Mrs. Glover. Looking forward to seeing you there. #WeAre #RichardWright

div.p: RWPCS is where you are molded into the leader you desire to become…where many opportunities are given…and many doors are opened!

As a former student of RICHARD WRIGHT PCS I am thrilled by how family oriented the staff is. When I started, I thought it was just going to be another place to temporarily attend, but the school made learning fun and they exposed me to great arts such as film, music production, graphic design, and live event entertainment.
